amendment.description: To require a report on the future aerial training airspace requirements of the Department of Defense.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4217 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4217 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Thune. (consideration: CR S6117-6122) To require a report on the future aerial training airspace requirements of the Department of Defense.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4217 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Thune.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4217 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
